column5: Cyber physical systems integrate computation with physical objects and processes. Examples of cyber physical systems are:'smart' devices in the home such as a smart meter or fridgevoice assistant devicesdriverless vehiclesmedical monitoring equipment wearable devicesrobotic assistantsOur course is designed for students with a background in computer science or a related field with analytical skills. You'll learn the principles of integrated system design and computational and cyber physical systems methods and tools. The key topics covered will include:
